definitions.definition: A sound made by a sudden release of electricity or some similar energy .

examples: You might feel a little zap touching a metal doorknob when the air is dry.

definitions.definition: A raucous public demonstration designed to embarrass a public figure or celebrity as a form of political activism .
The act of heating something in a microwave oven .

main_definition: ( colloquial ) A sound made by a sudden release of electricity or some similar energy .
secondary_definitions: A raucous public demonstration designed to embarrass a public figure or celebrity as a form of political activism .
( slang ) The act of heating something in a microwave oven .
